data.comment: The match is underway at Rugby Park.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Kilmarnock to check on Jeremie Frimpong, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 4, Jeremie Frimpong returns to the field for Celtic after picking up a slight injury.
Celtic have a dangerous throw-in.
Alan James Muir signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
In the minute 6, Kilmarnock attack but Nicke Kabamba's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kilmarnock.
Throw-in high up the field for Celtic in Kilmarnock.
In the minute 7, Celtic's Callum McGregor gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kilmarnock defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Celtic.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Celtic in their own half.
Alan James Muir signals a Kilmarnock throw-in in Celtic's half.
Free kick for Kilmarnock in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Celtic in the half of Kilmarnock.
Gary Dicker is booked for the home team.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Ryan Christie.
In the minute 12, Alan James Muir signals a free kick to Celtic.
Celtic advance rapidly upfield but Alan James Muir blows for offside.
Alan James Muir signals a throw-in for Celtic, close to Kilmarnock's area.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Kilmarnock at Rugby Park.
Kilmarnock awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alan James Muir awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Kilmarnock have been awarded a corner by Alan James Muir.
Kilmarnock needs to be cautious. Celtic have an attacking throw-in.
Celtic to take a throw-in in Kilmarnock territory.
In the minute 20, Free kick Celtic.
Ball safe as Kilmarnock is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kilmarnock at Rugby Park.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Kilmarnock is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kilmarnock have been given a penalty at Rugby Park...
Goal! Chris Burke makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
In the minute 25, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Celtic close to the penalty box.
Celtic are coming forward and Ryan Christie gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Kilmarnock goal kick.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Celtic in their own half.
Kilmarnock awarded a free kick in their own half.
Celtic awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Kilmarnock have a goal kick.
Kilmarnock awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kilmarnock's Nicke Kabamba attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 30, Alan James Muir awards Celtic a goal kick.
Throw-in Kilmarnock.
Goal kick for Kilmarnock at Rugby Park.
In the minute 33, In Kilmarnock a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Celtic goal kick.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
In the minute 35, Can Celtic capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kilmarnock's half?
In Kilmarnock a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Rugby Park, Alan Power has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 36, Celtic's Odsonne Edouard gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kilmarnock.
Alan James Muir signals a free kick to Kilmarnock in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Celtic in the half of Kilmarnock.
Throw-in for Celtic close to the penalty box.
Important block from the Celtic defence as Nicke Kabamba fires in a strike for Kilmarnock.
In the minute 42, In Kilmarnock, Odsonne Edouard of Celtic is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Kilmarnock in the half of Celtic.
Can Kilmarnock get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
In the minute 43, Celtic have a goal kick.
Alan James Muir awards Kilmarnock a goal kick.
Kilmarnock have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Alan James Muir awards the away team a throw-in.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first-half is over at Rugby Park.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
Brandon Haunstrup is replacing Rory McKenzie for the home team.
In the minute 48, Celtic needs to be cautious. Kilmarnock have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
Alan James Muir signals a Celtic throw-in in Kilmarnock's half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Kilmarnock at Rugby Park.
Celtic to take a throw-in in Kilmarnock territory.
Odsonne Edouard of Celtic gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 50, Alan James Muir awards Kilmarnock a goal kick.
Odsonne Edouard (Celtic) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Celtic in the half of Kilmarnock.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Kilmarnock.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Celtic capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kilmarnock's half?
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Celtic at Rugby Park.
Alan James Muir signals a free kick to Kilmarnock in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kilmarnock.
In the minute 56, Can Kilmarnock get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ryan Christie (Celtic) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 58, Alan James Muir signals a Kilmarnock throw-in in Celtic's half.
Throw-in for Celtic in their own half.
Celtic are pushing forward but Scott Brown's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Kilmarnock goal kick.
Throw-in for Kilmarnock in the half of Celtic.
Alan James Muir signals a free kick to Kilmarnock.
In the minute 64, Alan James Muir awards Celtic a goal kick.
Celtic's Callum McGregor misses with an attempt on goal.
Kilmarnock have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
Alan James Muir signals a free kick to Kilmarnock in their own half.
The match at Rugby Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Stuart Findlay, who is down injured.
In the minute 66, Neil Lennon (Celtic) is making a second substitution, with Hatem Elhamed replacing Jeremie Frimpong.
The away team have replaced Mohamed Elyounoussi with Patryk Klimala. This is the first substitution made today by Neil Lennon.
Callum McGregor for Celtic gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Kilmarnock at Rugby Park.
Stuart Findlay is back on the pitch.
Patryk Klimala for Celtic is whistled offside.
In the minute 69, Free kick Kilmarnock.
Odsonne Edouard for Celtic drives towards goal at Rugby Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick Kilmarnock.
In the minute 72, Celtic's Scott Brown has been booked in Kilmarnock.
Kilmarnock are pushing forward but Chris Burke's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kilmarnock.
In the minute 74, Celtic push forward at Rugby Park and Ryan Christie gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kilmarnock defence.
Celtic have been awarded a corner by Alan James Muir.
Kilmarnock have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 76, Can Kilmarnock get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
Alan James Muir signals a throw-in for Kilmarnock, close to Celtic's area.
In Kilmarnock a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Kilmarnock goal kick.
Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
Neil Lennon is making the team's third substitution at Rugby Park with Olivier Ntcham replacing Scott Brown.
In the minute 81, Celtic's Hatem Elhamed breaks free at Rugby Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kilmarnock have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Celtic close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Celtic to take a throw-in in Kilmarnock territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kilmarnock in their own half.
In the minute 86, Alan James Muir signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
Kilmarnock awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Alan James Muir awards Celtic a goal kick.
The home team replace Chris Burke with Greg Kiltie.
Throw-in high up the field for Kilmarnock in Kilmarnock.
Boli Bolingoli-Mbombo is replacing Greg Taylor for Celtic at Rugby Park.
In the minute 89, Alan James Muir signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
Goal kick for Kilmarnock at Rugby Park.
Throw-in for Celtic at Rugby Park.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kilmarnock goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kilmarnock.
Celtic drive upfield and Odsonne Edouard gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kilmarnock defender.
Kilmarnock to take a throw-in in Celtic territory.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
